mapper.select: SELECT work_order.*, elder_user.realname as elder_name, group_user.realname as group_name FROM work_order LEFT JOIN elder_user ON (work_order.elder_id = elder_user.account_id) LEFT JOIN group_user ON (work_order.account_id = group_user.account_id)
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO work_order (elder_id, account_id, type, content, price, service_time) VALUES ( #{elder_id}, #{account_id}, #{type}, #{content}, #{price}, #{service_time} )
mapper.update: UPDATE work_order SET type = #{type}, content = #{content}, price = #{price}, service_time = #{service_time} WHERE order_id = #{order_id};
